pengu.messenger

Class PenguMessengerRESTClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient

  • public class PenguMessengerRESTClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the methods necessary for communicating with the Pengu Messenger (PENGU) API Server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PenguMessengerRESTClient.Message
      This class extend the MessageReference class by adding a field for message content.
      static class  PenguMessengerRESTClient.MessageReference
      This class allows for MessageReference objects to be created, it links a message reference to a sender and size.
      static class  PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey
      This class allows for a public key object to be created to link a public key String to a username, expiry date and registration date.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String API_SERVER 
      static java.lang.String AUTHENTICATOR
      The authenticator main directory.
      static java.lang.String AUTHENTICATOR_EMAIL_VERIFICATION
      The authenticator endpoint to request for email verification.
      static java.lang.String AUTHENTICATOR_LOGIN
      The authenticator endpoint to request for a token.
      static java.lang.String AUTHENTICATOR_SIGNUP
      The authenticator endpoint to request to register.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE
      The message main directory.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_GET_PARTS
      The message endpoint to request for a message parent part and its child parts.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_GET_SUMMARY
      The message endpoint to request for a list of inbound messages.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_SEND_CHILD
      The message endpoint to request to send a message child.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_SEND_PARENT
      The message endpoint to request to send a message parent.
      static java.lang.String PRIVATE_KEY
      The private key main directory.
      static java.lang.String PRIVATE_KEY_ADD
      The private key endpoint to request to add a private key.
      static java.lang.String PRIVATE_KEY_GET
      The private key endpoint to request for private keys.
      static java.lang.String PRIVATE_KEY_REQUEST_RECOVERY_KEY
      The private key endpoint to request for a recovery key.
      static java.lang.String PUBLIC_KEY
      The public key main directory.
      static java.lang.String PUBLIC_KEY_ADD
      The public key endpoint to request to add a public key.
      static java.lang.String PUBLIC_KEY_SEARCH_USERS
      The public key endpoint to request for user public keys.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPublicKey(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String token, java.lang.String publicKey)
      Makes a request to add a public key to the server.
      PenguMessengerRESTClient.MessageReference[] getListOfMessageReferences(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String token)
      Makes a request to the server for inbound message (Fetches inbound message references).
      PenguMessengerRESTClient.Message getMessage(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String token, java.lang.String messageReference)
      Makes a request to download a specified message from the server.
      java.lang.String getToken(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Makes a request to the server for a access token (Logging-in).
      void registerUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email)
      Makes a request to register an account.
      PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey[] searchUsers(java.lang.String username, int page)
      Makes a request for user public keys, specified by a username (Search term), and a page number (If there are many results).
      void sendMessage(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String token, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String recipient)
      Makes a request to add a Message to the server, creates the parent message, and calculates and creates child messages.

      • getToken

        public java.lang.String getToken(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password)
                          throws PenguRESTClient.ServerErrorException,
                                 PenguRESTClient.BadRequestException,
                                 PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException,
                                 PenguRESTClient.NotFoundException,
                                 PenguRESTClient.ServiceDownException,
                                 PenguRESTClient.BadConnectionException
        Makes a request to the server for a access token (Logging-in).
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the account.
        password - The password of the account.
        Returns:
        Returns a token String if authentication was successful (as JSON Response text).
        Throws:
        PenguRESTClient.ServerErrorException
        PenguRESTClient.BadRequestException
        PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException
        PenguRESTClient.NotFoundException
        PenguRESTClient.ServiceDownException
        PenguRESTClient.BadConnectionException

                         PenguRESTClient.BadConnectionException

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String token,
                        java.lang.String message,
                        java.lang.String recipient)
                 throws PenguRESTClient.ServerErrorException,

                        PenguRESTClient.ServiceDownException,
                        PenguRESTClient.BadConnectionException,
                        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Makes a request to add a Message to the server, creates the parent message, and calculates and creates child messages.
        Parameters:
        username - The account username.
        token - The account temporary access token.
        message - The Message String.
        recipient - The recipient's username.
        Throws:

        public PenguMessengerRESTClient.Message getMessage(java.lang.String username,
                                                   java.lang.String token,
                                                   java.lang.String messageReference)
                                            throws PenguRESTClient.ServerErrorException,
                                                   PenguRESTClient.BadRequestException,

                                                   PenguRESTClient.ServiceDownException,
                                                   PenguRESTClient.BadConnectionException,
                                                   org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Makes a request to download a specified message from the server.
        Parameters:
        username - The account username.
        token - The account temporary access token.
        messageReference - The specified reference of the message.
        Returns:
        Returns JSON response text of the message.
        Throws:
